click to send an online condolence. view condolences. click to view online condolences. click to send a sympathy card powered by greeting. carduniverse. com photos view photo gallery. click to view photo gallery. share a photo. click to share a photo memory send a meal benefits benefits resources the department of veterans affairs offers this information to surviving spouses and dependents of military personnel who died while in active military service and to the survivors of veterans who died after active service. click to visit... the social security administration offers information about how your family members are protected if you die, and how you may qualify as a survivor on someone else's social security record. this protection is particularly important for young families with children. click to visit... grief resources funeral home contact others contact others. click to send someone a link to this page. link to social networks
